Studio Object
Objects Reference
Studio Object

Studios are found under productions, and often reflect a series of content.

id Unique identifier for the studio.

name Name of the studio.

created_date Date when the studio was created.

projects List of projects associated with the studio.

num_recordings Count of recordings associated with the studio.
